title: Aviator watch face HD Bundle
summary: High Quality Interactive Aviation Pack  for android wears

descriptionHTML:
Bundle Code
EF-B01

Category
Military

DEAL
EF-AD34,EF-AD35,EF-AD36

Enjoy the Collection of Beautiful Aviator watch face, which is available for all smart watches. (It has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R and Sony Smart watch 3 and others).it is available for all kind of watches including round and rectangle. it has following amazing features

FEATURES
 Interactive Touch
 Unlimited Color Theme
 Night Mode
 Analog Clock
 Digital Clock
 Smooth & Tick Needle Style
 Wear Battery Indication
 Mobile Battery Indication
 Date
 Day
 Month
 12 hour / 24 hour Time
 Unlimited Ambient Mode Colors [NEW]
 Custom Ambient Mode
 Default Ambient Mode Pack
 square & round watches support


And it doesn't end yet, follow the new customization options, features and updates,
don't forget to make a comment and please kindly leave your feedback and suggestions!
(Note: You can do all the customization from the Our Mobile App, you can open our mobile app from you application menu)


Keep an eye out for our others watch face creations that are coming out soon!

Follow Us on Twitter ! http://www.twitter.com/elitewatchface
Like Us on Facebook ! http://www.facebook.com/elitewatchface
Follow Us on Instagram ! https://www.instagram.com/elitewatchface
Follow Us on Google Plus ! https://plus.google.com/b/102084729733615241293

It has following configurations


CONFIGURATION:
 Turn On / Off Night Mode
 Auto Night Mode Setting
 Pick Your Favorite Color Theme
 Pick your favorite Ambient mode
 choose eye catching ambient mode color
 Switch between 12H & 24H time format
 Switch between Smooth & Tick Style Needle

For Email support Contact us at elitewatchface@gmail.com

Tip 1
Now we support 280x280 and 320x320 square watches
Tip 2
✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after re-sync, try these steps:
1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone)
2. Uninstall the watch face
3. Restart watch and connect device again
4. Then finally install the watch face
To install:
1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.
2. Long press your android wear watch and choose Aviator HD Bundle Watch Face as your watch face
Note

Please, rate us positive if you like our watch faces! Don't give a bad rating too soon. If you experienced a problem, please, send us an email and we will be happy to answer it and fix an issue soon as possible.
Compatible with Moto360, LG G Watch R, Sony smart watches...
